tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This is a human MGM that facilitates manual STT transcript correction by providing a human with the BBC transcript editor and HTML5 media player for the original media file. Note that, if the tool is run by a job submitted from AMPPD, the context parameter will be automatically generated by AMPPD; any user defined value will be overwritten.
